item.dc:creator: @Arthurnator Arthurnator
item.description:
@Arthurnator wrote:

public String clanName = "none", clanLeader = "nobody"; public String[] clanMembers = new String[17]; //19 total public int[] CCID = { 11941, 4287, 4288, 4289, 4290, 11134, 4291, 4292, 4293, 4294, 4295, 4296, 8935, 4297, 4298, 4299, 4300 }; public int clanRights = 0;

When i had to add that to my “Player.Java” class, it didnt have anywhere to put it, seeing as it was a blank source. So i added it at the top where you normally would, then i get 4 errors that im not too sure on how to fix seeing as im sort of new to java. The errors are…

Player.java:5: 'class' or 'interface' expected public String clanName = "none", clanLeader = "nobody"; ^ Player.java:6: 'class' or 'interface' expected public String[] clanMembers = new String[17]; //19 total ^ Player.java:7: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int[] CCID = { 11941, 4287, 4288, 4289, 4290, 11134, 4291, 4292, 4293, 42 94, 4295, 4296, 8935, 4297, 4298, 4299, 4300 }; ^ Player.java:8: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int clanRights = 0; ^ 4 errors You have sucsessfully compiled Press any key to continue . . .

So can anybody help me?

item.title: [317] Completely Server-Sided Clan Chat (uses music interface)
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

God11:

jw but idk where to add this in client java. i added at the top but got 100 errors. can osmoene help?

add it with all your other voids, for example, I would search up… “public void commands()” in my client.java and i would get something like this.

public void commands() { sendQuest("Chaotic-Pk's Commands", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("~~~~~~~~~~Normal~~~~~~~~~~~", 8147); sendQuest("::Pctime, ::explock, ::expunlock, ::pass", 8148); sendQuest("::mypks, ::maxhit, ::cwtime, ::cwp", 8149); sendQuest("::players, ::yell, ::fcguide, ::rules", 8150); sendQuest("::clankick, ::clanleave, ::clanmake,", 8151); sendQuest("::clandelete, ::clanrename, ::clanjoin", 8152); sendQuest("::clanmsg", 8153); sendQuest("~~~~~~~~~~Mod+~~~~~~~~~~~~~", 8154); sendQuest("::master, ::combat, ::prayer, ::xteleto,", 8155); sendQuest("::xteletome, ::xteleall, ::staffzone,", 8156); sendQuest("::pickup, ::hail, ::noclip, ::pure, ::modzone,", 8157); sendQuest("::suckit, ::mypos, ::resetdrops, ::onpickup,", 8158); sendQuest("::offpickup, ::food, ::alchs, ::duel, ::spec, ", 8159); sendQuest("::pnpc, ::unpc, ::emote, ::message, ::npcreset,", 8160); sendQuest("::vent, ::gfx, ::banuser, ::mute, ::bank, ::jail, ", 8161); sendQuest("::ipban, ::ipmute, ::copy", 8162); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } public void welcomeScreen() { sendQuest("Welcome to Chaotic-Pk", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Players Online : " +PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ ".", 8147); sendQuest("Things Being Worked On.", 8148); sendQuest("All basic Delta coding 100%", 8149); sendQuest("Real Barrows 0%", 8150); sendQuest("Fun Pk 100%", 8151); sendQuest("Chaotic Wars 90%", 8152); sendQuest("Staff zone 100%", 8153); sendQuest("Summoning 0%", 8154); sendQuest("Other stuff 90%", 8155); sendQuest("Cool Commands 90%", 8156); sendQuest("new Skilling area 10%", 8157); sendQuest("Pk Point system 100% (NEED TESTING!)", 8158); sendQuest("", 8159); sendQuest("", 8160); sendQuest("", 8161); sendQuest("", 8162); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } public void warHelp() { sendQuest("@gre@War of Bandos", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Dangerous minigame, items will be lost!", 8147); sendQuest("Be aware, there are many traps in the cave", 8148); sendQuest("Also be aware of players that want your loot!", 8149); sendQuest("Random effects might happen on your player!", 8150); sendQuest("You will be skulled on entrance", 8150); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

just add it with them.

item.title: [317] Completely Server-Sided Clan Chat (uses music interface)
item.dc:creator: @y0u_kn0w_m3 y0u kn0w m3
item.description:
@y0u_kn0w_m3 wrote:

lord killord:

lmao I wouldn’t make this … there’s a very simple way you can dupe through it (I won’t tell you how cause not many people know how) … even though not many people know, it’s still not worth the risk tbh so I won’t be adding it

if (command.startsWith("cckick") && !inTrade && !inCombat) { client p2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(7))]; if(clanName != "none" && clanLeader != "nobody" && p2.clanName == clanName && p2.clanLeader == clanLeader && p2.playerName != clanLeader) { p2.sM("You have been kicked from your clan by "+playerName+"."); p2.removeFromCC(); sM(command.substring(7)+" has been kicked successfully."); } } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ccleave") && !inTrade && !inCombat) { if(clanName != "none" && clanLeader != "nobody" && clanLeader != playerName) { sM("You have left your clan."); removeFromCC(); } } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ccdelete") && !inTrade && !inCombat) { if(clanName != "none" && clanLeader != "nobody" && clanLeader == playerName) { for(int i=0; i<=16; i++) { if(clanMembers[i] != null && clanMembers[i] != playerName) { client cm = (client) server.playerHandler.players[server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(clanMembers[i])]; cm.sM("The clan you were in has been deleted."); cm.removeFromCC(); } } sM("You have deleted your clan."); removeFromCC(); } } if (command.startsWith("ccrename") && !inTrade && !inCombat) { if(command.length() <= 24) { if(clanName != "none" && clanLeader != "nobody" && clanLeader == playerName) { clanName = command.substring(9); for(int i=0; i<=16; i++) { if(clanMembers[i] != null && clanMembers[i] != playerName) { client cmem = (client) server.playerHandler.players[server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(clanMembers[i])]; cmem.clanName = clanName; cmem.sM("The clan you're in has been renamed to "+clanName+"."); cmem.updateCCMenu(); } } updateCCMenu(); sM("Your clan has been renamed to "+clanName+"."); } } else { sM("Your clan name can be no longer than 15 characters."); } } if (command.startsWith("ccmake") && !inTrade && !inCombat) { if(command.length() <= 22) { if(clanName == "none" && clanLeader == "nobody") { clanName = command.substring(7); clanLeader = playerName; for(int i=0; i<=17; i++) { if(clanMembers[i] == null) { sM("Clan "+command.substring(7)+" has been created successfully."); clanMembers[i] = playerName; break; } } updateCCMenu(); } else { sM("You are already in a clan!"); } } else { sM("Your clan name can be no longer than 15 characters."); } } if (command.startsWith("ccjoin") && !inTrade && !inCombat) { if(server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(7)) != -1) { if(clanName == "none" && clanLeader == "nobody") { client c2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[server.playerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(7))]; //clanLeader if(c2.clanLeader == c2.playerName) { clanName = c2.clanName; clanLeader = c2.playerName; for(int i=0; i<=17; i++) { if(c2.clanMembers[i] == null) { c2.clanMembers[i] = playerName; sM("You have joined the clan "+clanName+"."); c2.sM(playerName+" has joined your clan."); break; } } updateCCMenu(); } else { sM("That player is not the leader of a clan."); } } else { sM("You are already in a clan!"); } } else { sM("Invalid player specified. Please make sure you've entered their name correctly."); } } if (command.startsWith("cm")) { if(clanLeader != "nobody" && clanName != "none") { sendClanMessage(command.substring(3)); } else { sM("You need to be in a clan to send clan messages!"); } }

That’s my codes for clan chat.
Did you see what i did? I added

&& !inTrade && !inCombat

Next to the command, and since all those commands lagg you out when you type them and are not in a clan, then you can dupe if you know the lag out trade dupe method. But now those commands will not lag you out inTrare or inCombat.

I know this is old and outdated, but for some noobs who still wanna use this clan chat method and are in fear of dupers, well now the clan chat duping is fixed.

Read full topic
